test_scenarios.name: Verify Service Availability at Valid Address
steps: Enter a valid service address (e.g., a known service area address).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The system displays available internet service options for the entered address.

test_scenarios.name: Successfully Complete a New Internet Order (Happy Path)
steps: Enter a valid service address where service is available.
Fill in required personal and billing information.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The system displays an order confirmation message and provides an order number.
